name: Vertigon
description:
Created for the Newbies Game Jam (2022-1), incorporating the Jam theme of "minimalism" and the optional challenge idea of "alone".

The player navigates a a red cube through levels in search of 25 pink dots. As the player moves from platform to platform, the gravity shifts, creating a dizzying landscape where up becomes down and left becomes right. Successfully collecting all 25 pink dots before the timer runs out will unlock the next level.

**If resolution looks a bit zoomed and wonky when launching from browser make sure to click the expand arrows at the bottom of the view panel to play in full screen.
